txt.en:
'Greetings traveller. I watch those who stride the roads of Middle-earth in search of challenge and adventure, and you seem just the sort. Indeed there are some who prefer even greater challenges to overcome, and I can assist you with this!

'Should you accept my boon, you will find your enemies on the roads and fields of Middle-earth becoming stronger and more dangerous in your quest for glory - is this what you desire?'

<rgb=#FFFF00>Completing this quest will make the game significantly more difficult.

Completing this quest before level 11 will begin deeds that can be completed by achieving levels 50 & 130 without reducing your difficulty below Fearless.

With Fearless difficulty active, you and up to two other fellowship members (who are also at Fearless or higher) can earn Tokens of Heroism for defeating enemies of your own level or higher. The chance of earning tokens increases slightly with difficulty level.</rgb>
Completing this quest will return you to normal difficulty and cancel any difficulty based deeds you may be pursuing.

Completing this quest will increase the threat posed by monsters you encounter during your travel through the landscapes of Middle-earth, while also providing a small bonus to experience gained in combat.

'Are you certain you wish to step foot upon this path? 'Tis understandable if you are wary - such harsh endeavours are surely not for everyone.'\n\n<rgb=#FFFF00>Completing this quest will increase the difficulty of enemies on landscape and in missions!</rgb>
Your road ahead has become more dangerous...
Completing this quest will change your current difficulty.
